ans a:

public class assignment {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int a=-5, b=8, c=6;
int total;
total=a+b*c;
System.out.println("The answer:"+ total);

	}

}


ans b:

public class assignment {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int a=55, b=9, c=9;
int total;
total=(a+b)%c;
System.out.println("The answer:"+ total);

	}

}


ans c:

public class assignment {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int a=20, b=-3, c=5, d=8;
int total;
total=a+b*c/d;
System.out.println("The answer:"+ total);

	}

}

ans d:


public class assignment {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int a=5, b=15, c=3, d=2, e=8, f=3;
int total;
total=a+b/c*d-e%f;
System.out.println("The answer:"+ total);

	}

}
